text: Asking Alexandria are a British metalcore band from York, North Yorkshire. Asking Alexandria have five members in the band; the current band members are Ben Bruce, James Cassells, Danny Worsnop, Cameron Liddell and Sam Bettley. They released their first album Stand Up and Scream on September 15, 2009. Their newest album Reckless & Relentless was released on April 5, 2011. They will release their third studio album in 2013. In 2012, Asking Alexandria received an 11th Annual Independent Music Award for the best metal/hardcore album for Reckless & Relentless. ==Band members== ;Current * Ben Bruce - lead guitar, backing vocals (2008–present) * James Cassells - drums (2008-present) * Cameron Liddell - rhythm guitar (2008-present) * Sam Bettley - bass guitar (2009–present) * Ryan Binns – keyboards, synthesizers, programming (2008, 2015-present) * Danny Worsnop - lead vocals, keyboards, programming (2008–2015, 2016-present) ;Former * Joe Lancaster – bass guitar (2008–2009) * Denis Stoff - lead vocals (2015–2016) ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Stand Up and Scream (2009) * Reckless & Relentless (2011) * From Death to Destiny (2013) * The Black (2016) * Asking Alexandria (2017) * Like a House on Fire (2020) ===Extended plays=== *Life Gone Wild (2010) *Under the Influence: A Tribute to the Legends of Hard Rock (2012) ===Remix albums=== *Stepped Up and Scratched (2011) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:English heavy metal bands Category:Metalcore bands
